about_the_game:
Dive into the vibrant and perilous microcosm within the human body in Microbial Mayhem. Your mission is clear: infiltrate and conquer, all while the immune system relentlessly defends its host.

Infinite Mode:
Embark on an endless microbial journey where each incursion becomes more challenging as the body's defences adapt. Gain experience and evolve - acquiring new abilities to stay ahead of the relentless onslaught.

Adventure Mode:
Coming 2024!

Features:
  • Intense Microbial Battles:Engage in tactical combat against the body's defensive mechanisms.
  • Strategic Evolution:Adapt to the host's immune responses, evolving through 14 different upgrade pathways. With more on the way!
  • Infinite Mode:Battle endlessly against the body's defences and compete with friends to achieve the highest score and longest survival time.
  • Permanently Upgrade:Collect DNA during your incursions to enhance your cells abilities and strengthen your chances of domination.
  • Achievement Hunter:Test your skills and unlock achievements by completing feats within the game. Showcase your mastery of microbial mayhem!

Microbial Mayhem: offers an immersive experience where strategic evolution and strategy are your keys to microbial domination. Can you conquer the relentless defences and reign supreme within the human body? Enter the microscopic battleground and find out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16384 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
